channel.title: Computational Linguistics | JooYoung Seo: RStudio Intern for Summer 2020; Learning Scientist for Inclusive Learning Ecologies

item.title: Discovering Informal Learning Cultures of Blind Individuals Pursuing STEM Disciplines: A Quantitative Ethnography Using Listserv Archives
item.description: This work has been presented in the First International Confrence on Quantitative Ethnography, and awarded The Cengage Fellowship.

item.title: Quantitative Ethnography
item.description: This project is a methodological journey towards my dissertation that employs a novel mixed-methods called “Quantitative Ethnography” employing data science approach to a large corpus of texts in a rigorous, reliable, and reproducible fashion.
